CollabDocumentMetric.name: CollabDocumentMetric
CollabDocumentMetric.description: Represents the engagement metrics for a Quip thread (document or spreadsheet) thatâ€™s linked to a Salesforce record.

Site.description: The ID of the Quip site in which the thread is located.

SourceTemplate.description: The ID of the template (if any) on which a Quip thread is based.

MetricDate.description: The date that the metric was gathered in your local time zone.

MetricDateOnly.description: The date that the metric was gathered in UTC. Available in API version 55.0 and later.

LastUpdatedDate.description: The date that the thread was created, last edited, or last shared in your local time zone.

LastUpdatedDateOnly.description: The date that the thread was created, last edited, or last shared in UTC. Available in API version 55.0 and later.

ViewerCount.description: The number of thread views by user for the specified MetricDate.

UpdateCount.description: The number of edits made on the thread on a given day.

EditorCount.description: For the specified MetricDate, the number of users who edited the Quip thread.

CommenterCount.description: For the specified MetricDate, the number of users who commented on the Quip thread.
